info.name: HustleX API v1
info.description:
Complete API collection for HustleX - Nigerian gig economy financial services platform.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require Bearer token authentication. Use the Login or Register endpoints to obtain tokens.

## Environment Variables
- `base_url`: API base URL
- `access_token`: JWT access token
- `refresh_token`: JWT refresh token
- `user_id`: Current user ID
- `wallet_id`: Current wallet ID

## Rate Limits
- Standard: 100 requests/minute
- Auth: 10 requests/minute
- Transactions: 30 requests/minute

exec: // Generate idempotency key for POST/PUT requests

request.description: Register a new user account. An OTP will be sent to the provided phone number for verification.

response.name: Validation Error

request.description: Verify OTP sent during registration or login. Returns JWT tokens on success.
Initiate login with phone and password. An OTP will be sent for 2FA verification.
Refresh access token using a valid refresh token.
Invalidate current session and refresh token.
Resend OTP for verification. Rate limited to prevent abuse.
Initiate password reset. An OTP will be sent to the registered phone.
Complete password reset with OTP verification.
Set transaction PIN for the first time. Required for financial transactions.
Change existing transaction PIN.

item.name: Wallet
item.description: Wallet management, transactions, and banking operations

request.description: Get current wallet balance including available and pending amounts.
Get paginated transaction history with optional filters.
Get detailed information about a specific transaction.
Initiate a wallet deposit via Paystack. Returns authorization URL for payment.
Verify deposit status after Paystack callback.

exec: console.log('Note: This endpoint requires transaction PIN');

request.description: Initiate withdrawal to linked bank account. Requires transaction PIN.
Transfer funds to another HustleX user.
Get list of linked bank accounts.
Add a new bank account. Account name is verified via NUBAN lookup.
Remove a linked bank account.
Get list of supported Nigerian banks.

response.name: Success

request.description: Verify bank account number and get account name via NUBAN.

item.name: Gigs
item.description: Gig marketplace - create, browse, and manage freelance opportunities

request.description: Browse available gigs with filters.

response.name: Success

request.description: Get gigs where user is client or freelancer.
Get detailed information about a specific gig.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Logo Design for Tech Startup",
  "description": "Need a modern, minimalist logo for our fintech startup. Should work well on both light and dark backgrounds.",
  "category": "design",
  "subcategory": "logo",
  "budget": {
    "min": 50000,
    "max": 100000,
    "type": "fixed"
  },
  "deadline": "2024-02-15",
  "skills": ["Adobe Illustrator", "Figma"],
  "attachments": []
}

request.description: Create a new gig listing as a client.
Update gig details. Only allowed for open gigs.
Cancel an open gig.
Submit a proposal as a freelancer.
Get proposals for a gig (client only).
Accept a proposal and create a contract.
Get contract details for a gig.
Mark a milestone as complete (freelancer).
Approve milestone and release payment (client). Requires PIN.
Submit a review for a completed gig.
Get list of gig categories and subcategories.

response.name: Success

item.name: Savings (Ajo/Esusu)
item.description: Traditional rotating savings circles (Ajo/Esusu) - digital implementation

request.description: Get savings circles user is a member of.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "items": [
      {
        "id": "circle_abc123",
        "name": "Tech Professionals Ajo",
        "description": "Monthly savings for tech workers",
        "contributionAmount": 50000,
        "frequency": "monthly",
        "memberCount": 10,
        "maxMembers": 12,
        "currentRound": 3,
        "totalRounds": 12,
        "status": "active",
        "nextContributionDate": "2024-02-01",
        "myPosition": 5,
        "myTotalContributed": 150000,
        "poolAmount": 500000,
        "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
      }
    ]
  }
}

request.description: Get detailed information about a savings circle.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Friends Savings Group",
  "description": "Monthly savings among friends",
  "contributionAmount": 25000,
  "frequency": "monthly",
  "maxMembers": 6,
  "startDate": "2024-02-01",
  "isPrivate": true
}

request.description: Create a new savings circle. Creator becomes admin.
Invite a user to join the savings circle.

Make a contribution to the savings circle.
Get contribution history for a circle.
Get payout history and schedule for a circle.
Get user's overall savings statistics.
